description:
With their deep lenses and sporty wrap, these sunnies bring focus to your summer training sessions. The semi-rimless design keeps the top of the lens clear, offering you an unobstructed view when out on the hoods or tucked into aerobars. Equipped with Ryders’ FYRE™ lenses, their most advanced lens technology ever, you get ultra-clear NXT photochromatic lenses that transition faster than normal photochromic lenses, and deliver improved contrast in all conditions. FYRE lenses help you will see what you need to see, in all conditions, no more fussing with lens changes.

  • Fits small to medium faces best
  • NXT photochromic lens. NXT lens offers improved clarity over standard polycarbonate lenses and improves the durability and responsiveness of the photochromic lenses
  • Photochromic lenses change with the changing light conditions, meaning one lens takes you from overcast to bright sun
  • ColourBoost™ lenses deliver vibrant colours and excellent contrast, making them a great choice for challenging light conditions
  • Treated with a military grade anti-fog material. Anti-fog lenses perform best when clean. Simply wash the lenses with water and they’ll keep your vision clear. When not in use, store them in a warm, dry environment
  • Custom engineered frame and lenses increase airflow to reduce fogging
  • Adjustable anti-slip nose pads and temple tips keep the glasses in place
  • Grilamid TR90 thermoplastic frames are flexible, durable and light
  • 8-base lens curve provides face hugging coverage
name: Ryders Eyewear Flyp Sunglasses
